Summary: Ft. Lauderdale hovering blue orb UFO 01-22-2012
divs: sighting details1\22\2012 visiting with friends in ft. lauderdale, fl (sunrise)taking random pictures of the sites. i noticed after i came home and looked at the pictures that out of the thousands i took that day, 63 of them had a blue orb that moved around throughout those 63. it was about three hours between the 63 pictures, as they were not taken in succession. beautiful day, clear and cloudy sky. i was very surprised when i saw it in the pictures and needed to report it.
